thread.title_full: SEE: Aashka Goradia is busy travelling the world with partner Brent Goble : What's hot, News - India Today

title: SEE: Aashka Goradia is busy travelling the world with partner Brent Goble : What's hot, News - India Today
text:
A post shared by Aashka Goradia (@aashkagoradia) on Feb 18, 2017 at 7:38am PST 
The lovely actress recently posted a picture of herself with Brent with the caption, "Travel, it leaves you speechless and then it turns you into a storyteller, so travel, to seek other places, other cities and definitely other souls. I found you @ibrentgoble my #partner #world #traveller. Can't wait to begin this journey with you. We are the #globetrotters #wanderers #travellers. That's why we met, that's why we came to this planet. To become the #WORLDTRAVELLER." A post shared by Aashka Goradia (@aashkagoradia) on Feb 17, 2017 at 1:54am PST Super-cute, aren't they? A post shared by Aashka Goradia (@aashkagoradia) on Feb 17, 2017 at 2:17am PST For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
